description: Largest t such that a spherical t-design with n points exists in 3 dimensions.
comments: Most of these values are just conjectures.
links: R. H. Hardin and N. J. A. Sloane, McLaren's Improved Snub Cube and Other New Spherical Designs in Three Dimensions, Discrete Comp. Geom., 15 (1996), 429-441 (Abstract)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, R. H. Hardin
